item.title: Report E-2024080695
item.description:
Report E-2024080695

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-29T09:23:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-16
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On August 16, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum of hydrochloric acid was punctured by a skid and released approximately fifteen (15) gallons of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from TPM Group (TPM) to remediate the impacted site. Crews deployed granular absorbents to the hydrochloric acid-impacted trailer and swept them in with hand tools. All spent absorbents were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum for transport and disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024081650
item.description:
Report X-2024081650

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-26T06:17:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-10
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE DUE TO IT LEAKING AN UNKNOWN GREY COLORED PAINT MATERIAL. UNABLE TO DETERMINE ANY INFORMATION ON THE PAINT PAILS DUE TO THE SEVERITY OF THE LEAK. THERE WAS AN ADDITIONAL UN1950 AEROSOL, FLAMMABLE X 12 OZ CAN OF REDISPRAY INHIBITIVE SHOPCOAT DARK GREY PRIMER THAT DID NOT LEAK. INVOICE AND THERMAL LABEL DESCRIPTION INDICATES PAINT BUT DOES NOT HAVE ANY DANGEROUS GOODS PAPERWORK OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO DECLARE THE PAINT PRODUCT OR THE UN1950 AEROSOL. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024081443
item.description:
Report X-2024081443

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-23T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-18
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO THE IMPORT INSPECT AREA DUE TO A PACKAGE INSPECTION ON 18-AUGUST-2024. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (2) FLAMELESS RATION HEATERS CLASSIFIED AS 4.3 DANGEROUS WHEN WET (UN2813), (2) BOOKS OF MATCHES AND (2) PLASTIC BAG WITH MATCHES (UN1944, MATCHES, SAFETY, 4.1, III) AND (2) BLISTER PACKS OF SAUSO KURO HEATING TABLETS (UN1328, HEXAMETHYLENETETRAMINE, 4.1, III). NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024081435
item.description:
Report X-2024081435

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-23T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-18
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE ORIGINALLY ARRIVED IN TO LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY UPS WORLDPORT OPERATIONS ON 11-MAY-2024 WHERE IT WAS STAGED FOR CLEARANCE FROM CUSTOMS. PACKAGE WAS RETAINED BY CUSTOMS UNTIL UPS WORLDPORT RESPONDED TO THE IMPORT INSPECT AREA DUE TO THE CUSTOMS AGENT DISCOVERY OF THE UNDECLARED PRODUCTS ON 18-AUGUST-24. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS, UPS DISCOVERED (20) FLAMELESS RATION HEATERS CLASSIFIED AS 4.3 DANGEROUS WHEN WET. NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 7V077R, GAIN COSMETIC CO LTD, RM 201, 9, YONGGOK-RO 20BEON-GIL, YANGJI-MYEON, YONGIN 17161 SOUTH KOREA.
